price: 49. Kasi ezali na bilembo bia polele bizali okati ya mitema mia baye bapesami boyebi. Mpe baboyaka mikapo mia biso sé babubi.
arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: bal huwa āyātun bayyinātun fī ṣudūri alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wamā yajḥadu biāyātinā illā al-ẓālimūna
